trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> is placed on every control and is sized to the exact bounds of each control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> é colocado em cada controle e é dimensionado para os limites exatos de cada controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> que representa o cursor que será exibido quando o ponteiro do mouse estiver sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The component with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
trans-unit.target: O componente ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> com o qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> that represents the cursor to display when the mouse pointer is over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> que representa o cursor que será exibido quando o ponteiro do mouse estiver sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.

trans-unit.source: The component with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
trans-unit.target: O componente ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner" /> with which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner" /> com o qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" />.
Um ponto para fazer o teste de clique.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um clique do mouse no ponto especificado deve ser manipulado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.ControlBodyGlyph" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> is associated with <paramref name="p" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph" /> for associado a <paramref name="p" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.
